des: "This twist on the traditional margarita is lightly sweet but packs a punch. A friend claims to have been temporarily paralyzed the morning after enjoying a few of these 'Blue Meanies!' You can also blend this with the ice."
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Pour tequila, orange juice, triple sec, lemon juice, lime juice, and blue Curacao over the ice; shake. Strain into a pint glass filled with ice.
